mapper.insert: insert into MM_APPLICATION_RETURN_PARAM (PK_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIPTION,APP_ID) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PK_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIPTION,APP_ID from MM_APPLICATION_RETURN_PARAM
